title: HF has higher BP than other HX compounds

content.question: The liquefied hydrogen halides have the normal boiling points given above. The relatively high boiling point of HF can be correctly explained by which of the following?

choices.label: HF molecules have a smaller dipole moment.
HF molecules tend to form hydrogen bonds.

content.answer: HF molecules tend to form hydrogen bonds.

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
